filmography.title: Peter Ibbetson
filmography.role_description: A supporting role as a young woman in this surreal romance, marking one of her early Hollywood appearances.
filmography.plot: An architect, in love with the Duchess of Towers, is imprisoned for a murder he didn't commit and meets her in his dreams.

filmography.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
filmography.role_description: A terrified woman who hires Sherlock Holmes to protect her brother from a family curse and Professor Moriarty.
filmography.plot: The master detective Holmes battles his archenemy, Professor Moriarty, who is planning to steal the Crown Jewels.

filmography.title: The Light That Failed
filmography.role_description: A cockney streetwalker and model who destroys an artist's masterpiece in a fit of rage; a critical breakthrough performance.
filmography.plot: An artist goes blind from an injury received in the Sudan, destroying his painting career and complicating his love life.

filmography.title: They Drive by Night
filmography.role_description: A femme fatale who murders her husband to be with a truck driver, culminating in a legendary courtroom breakdown scene.
filmography.plot: Two brothers struggle to make a living as truck drivers, but their lives are complicated by accidents and a murder accusation.

filmography.title: High Sierra
filmography.role_description: A tough, loyal dance-hall girl who stands by the doomed gangster 'Mad Dog' Earle until the bitter end.
filmography.plot: After being released from prison, a notorious thief is hired to rob a luxury resort, but the job goes wrong and he flees into the mountains.

filmography.title: The Sea Wolf
filmography.role_description: An escaped convict who finds herself trapped on a seal-hunting ship run by a brutal captain.
filmography.plot: Survivors of a ferry collision are rescued by a seal-hunting schooner run by a brutal captain who holds them captive.

filmography.title: Out of the Fog
filmography.role_description: A naive girl who falls for a racketeer terrorizing her father, blinding herself to his true nature.
filmography.plot: Two fishermen are terrorized by a gangster demanding protection money, but the daughter of one falls in love with him.

filmography.title: Ladies in Retirement
filmography.role_description: A sinister housekeeper who murders her employer to provide a home for her two mentally unstable sisters.
filmography.plot: A housekeeper kills her employer to protect her two sisters from being sent to an asylum, but guilt and suspicion mount.

filmography.title: Moontide
filmography.role_description: A suicidal woman rescued from the pier by a rough dockworker, leading to a tender but threatened romance.
filmography.plot: A dockworker saves a woman from suicide and they fall in love, but his jealous friend tries to destroy their happiness.

filmography.title: The Hard Way
filmography.role_description: A ruthless, ambitious woman who pushes her younger sister into show business to escape their coal-mining town poverty.
filmography.plot: A woman pushes her younger sister to stardom to escape their bleak life, destroying everyone who gets in her way.

filmography.title: In Our Time
filmography.role_description: An English girl who marries a Polish count just as World War II begins, facing the Nazi invasion.
filmography.plot: An English antique dealer marries a Polish count in 1939, and they must defend their home against the Nazi invasion.

filmography.title: Pillow to Post
filmography.role_description: A traveling saleswoman who fakes a marriage to a soldier to secure a room in a crowded motel.
filmography.plot: A woman desperate for a room in a housing-short WWII town persuades a soldier to pose as her husband.

filmography.title: Devotion
filmography.role_description: A biopic portrayal of the famous author of 'Wuthering Heights' and her relationship with her sisters.
filmography.plot: A highly fictionalized account of the lives of the Brontë sisters, Charlotte, Emily, and Anne, and their literary careers.

filmography.title: The Man I Love
filmography.role_description: A tough, blues-singing nightclub performer who deals with mobsters and family troubles while visiting her sisters.
filmography.plot: A nightclub singer visits her family for Christmas and gets involved with a local mobster while trying to help her siblings.

filmography.title: Deep Valley
filmography.role_description: A shy, stuttering farm girl who shelters an escaped convict, finding confidence and love in the process.
filmography.plot: A lonely, mistreated farm girl falls in love with an escaped convict hiding in her barn.

filmography.title: Road House
filmography.role_description: A tough, chain-smoking lounge singer who becomes the center of a violent triangle between a club owner and his manager.
filmography.plot: A nightclub owner's obsession with his new singer turns violent when she falls for his best friend and manager.

filmography.title: Lust for Gold
filmography.role_description: A treacherous woman who seduces a man to find the location of the legendary Lost Dutchman's Gold Mine.
filmography.plot: A woman and her husband plot to steal a gold mine map from a man she seduces, leading to disaster in the desert.

filmography.title: Woman in Hiding
filmography.role_description: A woman who fakes her own death to escape her murderous husband, but must prove his guilt before he finds her.
filmography.plot: A newlywed wife discovers her husband killed her father and wants to kill her, so she flees and fakes her death.

filmography.title: On Dangerous Ground
filmography.role_description: A blind woman living in a remote snowy cabin who humanizes a brutal city cop hunting her brother.
filmography.plot: A tough city cop is sent to the country to help solve a murder and is softened by the blind sister of the suspect.

filmography.title: Beware, My Lovely
filmography.role_description: A war widow terrorized in her own home by a mentally unstable handyman.
filmography.plot: A widow hires a handyman who turns out to be mentally unbalanced and holds her hostage in her own house.

filmography.title: The Bigamist
filmography.role_description: A lonely waitress who unknowingly marries a man who already has a wife; noted for being directed by Lupino herself.
filmography.plot: A traveling salesman secretly maintains two wives and families in different cities.

filmography.title: Private Hell 36
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who becomes involved with a corrupt cop who stole money from a robbery.
filmography.plot: Two detectives steal money from a robbery suspect, leading to guilt, paranoia, and betrayal.

filmography.title: The Big Knife
filmography.role_description: The estranged wife of a Hollywood movie star who begs him not to sign a new contract with a corrupt studio head.
filmography.plot: A Hollywood actor wants to quit the business to save his marriage, but a studio boss blackmails him into staying.
filmography.awards: Venice Film Festival: Nomination – Golden Lion

filmography.title: While the City Sleeps
filmography.role_description: A sharp-tongued newspaper columnist who manipulates her colleagues during a hunt for a serial killer.
filmography.plot: Reporters at a newspaper compete to catch a serial killer, using their women as bait to get the scoop.

filmography.title: Junior Bonner
filmography.role_description: The weary but loving mother of an aging rodeo star, dealing with her estranged, dreaming husband.
filmography.plot: An aging rodeo rider returns to his hometown to compete and connect with his family, finding that time has moved on.

filmography.title: The Devil's Rain
filmography.role_description: A woman whose family is cursed by a Satanic cult leader, leading to a melting horror finale.
filmography.plot: A Satanist leader seeks a book of names that will allow him to deliver souls to the devil, targeting a specific family.
filmography.awards: Saturn Award: Win – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: The Food of the Gods
filmography.role_description: A farm woman who discovers a mysterious substance that causes animals to grow to giant size; Lupino's final film role.
filmography.plot: A mysterious substance bubbles out of the ground on a remote island, causing chickens, rats, and wasps to grow into man-eating giants.
